trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the SiteMapDataSourceDesigner control.
Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
Gets a value indicating whether the schema can be refreshed.
This implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView"></xref> for the specified view.
The XPath query for the part of the data source to retrieve.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerHierarchicalDataSourceView"></xref> object.
Gets an array of names representing named views in the data source.
Named views are not implemented in this data source designer.
Views are retrieved based on an XPath query rather than name.
This implementation always returns an empty string array.
Initializes the designer and loads the specified component.
The component.
Called when the associated component changes.

The OnComponentChanged also calls the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method, which raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event, and also calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method which raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> event.
The object that raised the event.
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"></xref> object containing information about the event.
Called by the designer host to refresh the schema of the underlying data source.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to suppress data source events until the refresh operation has completed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanConfigure%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the underlying data source has a configuration wizard that can be launched with the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Configure" name="Configure" href=""></xref> method; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.CanRefreshSchema%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.Configure%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
The name of the view to get.
A designer data-source view that contains information about the identified view, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a view with the specified name is not found.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
The names of the views in the underlying data source.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> suppresses data source events until the refresh is finished.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SiteMapDataSourceDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
